clui

Class BoardPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • clui.BoardPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameListener

    public class BoardPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameListener
    Helper methods to print out Boards on the console. This class can also be used as a GameListener; it will cause the board to be printed whenever the board changes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardPrinter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clear()
      Clear the console.
      void gameChanged(Game g)
      Print the current board and an indication of whether the game is over and, if it is, whether it is a draw and who the winner is.
      static void printBoard(Board b)
      Print the board.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardPrinter

        public BoardPrinter()

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear the console.

      • printBoard

        public static void printBoard(Board b)
        Print the board. For example: 
              0   1   2   3   4
    +---+---+---+---+---+
  0 |   |   |   |   |   |
    +---+---+---+---+---+
  1 |   | X | O |   |   |
    +---+---+---+---+---+
  2 |   |   | X |   |   |
    +---+---+---+---+---+

      • gameChanged

        public void gameChanged(Game g)
        Print the current board and an indication of whether the game is over and, if it is, whether it is a draw and who the winner is.
        Specified by:
        gameChanged in interface GameListener
